message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Hopefully, we can work something out before inflation eats away at our gains!
Your cut decreases significantly with each round due to inflation. I propose a more reasonable split. Let's settle this quickly.
I'm willing to compromise, but I won't accept a deal that gives me less than 70%. Let's work together to make this fair for both of us.
The longer this goes on, the less you'll get. This is my final offer for a reasonable split.
This is getting ridiculous! I'm willing to lower my share, but 65% is my bottom line. Let's settle this before we both lose even more!
Alice, let's be realistic. We're past the halfway point, and this is the most equitable deal. Any more stalling, and we'll both lose out significantly.
